    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        public static DirectBytes allocate(long size)
        Allocates a direct ByteBuffer based byte array.

        When the array is constructed, DirectMemoryAllocator will be used to allocate size bytes of off-heap memory. Memory is accessed by the buffer directly via Unsafe.

        Parameters:
        size - The size of the buffer to allocate (in bytes).
        Returns:
        The native buffer.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If size is greater than the maximum allowed size for a ByteBuffer - Integer.MAX_VALUE - 5

      • copy

        public DirectBytes copy()
        Copies the bytes to a new byte array.
        Returns:
        A new HeapBytes instance backed by a copy of this instance's array.
